::Hot Rod::

He decided to start from the top. 
"Well, we met at the Maximal base. I was a Maximal and you were there
pretending to be a Maximal so you could reprogram bots. We fell in love.
Then you reprogramed me, and we escaped to the Alliance base. We were
still a couple when you self destructed." He though about another thing
she might bas asking.
"And if your woundering, we DID... well you know."
